00010 #ifdef WIN32
00011 int WINAPI WinMain (HINSTANCE hInstance, HINSTANCE hPrevInstance, 
00012                     LPSTR lpCmdLine, int nShowCmd){
00013 
00014   // We must fake the argc and argv variables
00015   // to prevent FXApp::init() call.
00016   int argc=1;
00017   char* fakeArgv="";
00018   char** argv=&fakeArgv;
00019 
00020 #  else
00021 int main(int argc,char ** argv) {
00022 #endif
00023 
00024   // The main erturn value
00025   int execRet=0;
00026   
00027   FXApp application("RainbruRPG","rainbruFreeFr");
00028   
00029   // The true should cause a segfault if omitted
00030   application.init(argc,argv, true);
00031   
00032   new Launcher(&application);
00033   
00034   application.create();
00035 
00036   // Return 999 if the game may run
00037   int ret =application.run();
00038 
00039   if (ret==999){
00040     // The game must be launched
00041     std::cout << "To be continued..." <<  std::endl;
00042   }
00043   else{
00044     // The 'Quit' button was clicked : stopping execution
00045     std::cout << "Stopping execution of RainbruRPG" <<  std::endl;
00046     execRet=ret;
00047   }
00048 
00049   return execRet;
00050  }
